author: Julien Wehrbach

changelog.release_notes:
You can now set your own tracker ! Up to 20 characters, special thanks to Jeff Jessie who gave me this idea :
"are there plans to add any other activities to the tracker? Like days since last "health related" issue. Or something to that "

Please heart it if you love it !

Besides the standard digital clock display, you will be able to track time of specific events.

There're sometimes, things we can be proud of, be it a marriage, stop smoking or many more. Or other kind of events, sad ones, nonetheless milestones in our lives.
This Watchface will help you tracking how much time has passed since those events.

- Configurable event time tracker
- 12 or 24 clock format
- 10 points battery tracking status
- bluetooth connectivity

SquareFont from http://www.dafont.com/squarefont.font

description:
Please heart it if you love it !

! Important, you have to uninstall (remove from your library) the old version 1.0 to use the 1.1


Besides the standard digital clock display, you will be able to track time of specific events.

There're sometimes, things we can be proud of, be it a marriage, stop smoking or many more. Or other kind of events, sad ones, nonetheless milestones in our lives.
This Watchface will help you tracking how much time has passed since those events.

- Configurable event time tracker 
- You can now set custom tracker, up to 20 characters 
- 12 or 24 clock format
- 10 points battery tracking status
- Actual battery charging state !
- bluetooth connectivity

SquareFont from http://www.dafont.com/squarefont.font

title: Event-Tracker ZWatch
